att.name: results_email_to
att.description: Email address to send results email to

att.name: results_email_send
att.description: Whether to send a results email

att.name: min_age
att.description: Minimum age of a snapshot tpo appear on the report in days

att.name: warn_age
att.description: Age of a snapshot (in days) for a warning email to be sent

att.name: delete_age
att.description: Age of a snapshot for it to be automatically deleted.

att.name: no_creator_email
att.description: If a snapshot creator email address cannot be found, emails will be sent to this address.

att.name: exclusion_tag_name
att.description: If a tag with the name is on a VM, the snapshots are not automatically deleted.

att.name: cc_address
att.description: Address to copy all emails to
